Panels

One of the useful component when you need to put your content inside the box. This will serve a simple container for semantic layout.



Basic Setup

Use a class name ".panel" and ".panel-content". You can also apply different colors / theme to whatever you desire.

Heading

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Delectus reiciendis sed inventore veritatis illo doloribus aspernatur. Sit ullam possimus officia labore. Autem, architecto, sunt, incidunt, repellendus sapiente facere inventore molestias enim minus modi harum repellat odit libero voluptates minima sequi!

Link

HTML example markup
<div class="panel">
	<div class="panel-content">
		...
	</div>	
</div>


Panel with Top / Bottom

Panel top and bottom is separated from the content. Use class name ".panel-top" and ".panel-bottom".

Panel Top

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Delectus reiciendis sed inventore veritatis illo doloribus aspernatur. Sit ullam possimus officia labore. Autem, architecto, sunt, incidunt, repellendus sapiente facere inventore molestias enim minus modi harum repellat odit libero voluptates minima sequi!

Button

Panel Bottom


HTML example markup
<div class="panel primary">
	<div class="panel-top">
		...
	</div>
	<div class="panel-content">
		...
	</div>	
	<div class="panel-bottom">
		...
	</div>
</div>


Panel Themes

An option to make numerous amount of panels, with different colors / themes.

HTML example markup
<div class="panel default">...</div>
<div class="panel primary">...</div>
<div class="panel secondary">...</div>
<div class="panel tertiary">...</div>
<div class="panel completed">...</div>
<div class="panel error">...</div>
<div class="panel important">...</div>


SASS Configuration Variables

// Panel - Basic Styling
$panel-margin-bottom: $margin-bottom-default!default;
$panel-border-radius: $border-radius-default !default;

// Panel Top - Basic Styling
$panel-top-bg: inherit !default;
$panel-top-color: inherit !default;
$panel-top-border: 1px solid darken($color-gray-lighten, 15%) !default;
$panel-top-border-radius: $border-radius-default !default;

// Panel Top - padding adjustable top / right / bottom / left.
$panel-top-padding-top-default: $padding-top-default !default;
$panel-top-padding-bottom-default: $padding-bottom-default !default;
$panel-top-padding-left-default: $padding-left-default !default;
$panel-top-padding-right-default: $padding-right-default !default;

// Panel Top - padding for Small screen
$panel-top-padding-top-small: $padding-top-default !default;
$panel-top-padding-bottom-small: $padding-bottom-default !default;
$panel-top-padding-left-small: $padding-left-default !default;
$panel-top-padding-right-small: $padding-right-default !default;

// Panel Top - padding for Medium screen
$panel-top-padding-top-medium: $padding-top-default !default;
$panel-top-padding-bottom-medium: $padding-bottom-default !default;
$panel-top-padding-left-medium: $padding-left-default !default;
$panel-top-padding-right-medium: $padding-right-default !default;

// Panel Content - Basic Styling
$panel-content-bg: transparent !default;
$panel-content-color: inherit !default;
$panel-content-border: 1px solid darken($color-gray-lighten, 15%) !default;
$panel-content-border-radius: 0 !default;
$panel-content-border-radius-bottom: 0 !default;

// Panel Content - padding adjustable top / right / bottom / left.
$panel-content-padding-top-default: 20px !default;
$panel-content-padding-bottom-default: 20px !default;
$panel-content-padding-left-default: 20px !default;
$panel-content-padding-right-default: 20px !default;

// Panel Content - padding for Small screen
$panel-content-padding-top-small: 20px !default;
$panel-content-padding-bottom-small: 20px !default;
$panel-content-padding-left-small: 20px !default;
$panel-content-padding-right-small: 20px !default;

// Panel Content - padding for Medium screen
$panel-content-padding-top-medium: 20px !default;
$panel-content-padding-bottom-medium: 20px !default;
$panel-content-padding-left-medium: 20px !default;
$panel-content-padding-right-medium: 20px !default;

// Panel Bottom - Basic Styling
$panel-bottom-bg: inherit !default;
$panel-bottom-color: inherit !default;
$panel-bottom-border: 1px solid darken($color-gray-lighten, 15%) !default;
$panel-bottom-border-radius: $border-radius-default !default;

// Panel Bottom - padding adjustable top / right / bottom / left
$panel-bottom-padding-top-default: $panel-top-padding-top-default !default;
$panel-bottom-padding-bottom-default: $panel-top-padding-bottom-default !default;
$panel-bottom-padding-left-default: $panel-top-padding-left-default !default;
$panel-bottom-padding-right-default: $panel-top-padding-right-default !default;

// Panel Top - padding for Small screen
$panel-bottom-padding-top-small: $panel-top-padding-top-small !default;
$panel-bottom-padding-bottom-small: $panel-top-padding-bottom-small !default;
$panel-bottom-padding-left-small: $panel-top-padding-left-small !default;
$panel-bottom-padding-right-small: $panel-top-padding-right-small !default;

// Panel Top - padding for Medium screen
$panel-bottom-padding-top-medium: $panel-top-padding-top-medium !default;
$panel-bottom-padding-bottom-medium: $panel-top-padding-bottom-medium !default;
$panel-bottom-padding-left-medium: $panel-top-padding-left-medium !default;
$panel-bottom-padding-right-medium: $panel-top-padding-right-medium !default;

See config.scss for complete reference.
